Description:
Sales Specialist - Hotel SupplyCompany Overview:We are an established supplier of a diverse range of products tailored for the hospitality industry. We are currently seeking a Sales Specialist with expertise in hotel supply to join our team. This role involves engaging with hotel clients, expanding our client base, sourcing products, and ensuring smooth order delivery.Job Role and Responsibilities:As a Sales Specialist in Hotel Supply, you will play a crucial role in expanding our market presence and delivering exceptional service to our clients.Your responsibilities will include:Customer Engagement: Respond to inquiries from hotel customers promptly and professionally. Understand their needs, provide suitable solutions, and build strong relationships.
Business Development: Identify and approach potential new clients in the hospitality industry. Work towards registering our company as an approved vendor for various hotels and establishments.
Product Sourcing: Collaborate with potential vendors to comprehend customer requirements. Source suitable products from local and international markets that align with the clients' needs and quality expectations.
Vendor Negotiations: Negotiate terms with vendors, including price, production timelines, and delivery schedules. Work for win-win outcomes that ensure both our company's and the client's satisfaction.
Logistics Coordination: Liaise with shipping agents to ensure timely and accurate delivery of customer orders. Monitor shipment progress and handle any potential issues.
Relationship Management: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with both existing and new clients. Understand their needs and proactively propose suitable solutions.
Market Insights: Stay updated on market trends, competitor offerings, and emerging opportunities within the hotel supply sector. Use this knowledge to refine our product offerings and business strategies.Skills
